entry.title: Photos Post 22: Special Events (after 1975), Part 60
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo from the special event 198x-0000 Event B, India has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 low resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the Photo in the smallest gallery: Collection 198x.
Please kindly share the link with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!
